metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7208 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The decode_residual function in libavcodec in libav 9.21 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) or obtainsensitive information from process memory via a crafted h264 video file.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
